subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Radio Shack Hack Help
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:

Hi Chrissy
   
  Mike Colletta was nice enough to help out in that area and post some step by step video so you can watch it as he modifies the radio(s). Check out his site ufogeek.com =)
   
  Or heres the links for some of his youtube postings
   
  RS 12-470
  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YN8iJjEq5Kg
   
  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMmt0Xx8fBg
   
  RS 12-469
  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RwvjhHd09hM
   
  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qc4IXGoz6cg
   
  There are quite of few people posting thier sessions and you will find a few Frank S. and others did on youtube as well. 
   
  That pretty much covers the how to step by step, you can rewind or pause for each step thru the process. After that its just a matter of running the sessions and recording any results that might come thru.
   
  Misty
   
  

Christine <ladychrissyleo@...> wrote:
          Can some one type me up a detailed description on how to use this and
what else I need to make it work. I have a seizure disorder and fibro
which effects my memory and I cannot comprehend what I need to do with it.
Can some one please help me.
hugs
Chrissy
